briefTitle: The Effect of Per Oral Immunotherapy in Severe IgE Mediated Egg, Milk, and Nut Allergy in Adults
officialTitle: The Effect of Per Oral Immunotherapy in Severe IgE Mediated Egg, Milk and Nut Allergy in Adults

eligibilityCriteria.criteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* severe IgE-mediated milk allergy or
* severe IgE-mediated egg allergy or
* severe IgE-mediated nut allergy or
* 18-50 years

Exclusion Criteria:

* instable cerebrovascular or heart disease
* active autoimmune disease or cancer
* use of betablocker agents
* poorly controlled asthma
* FEV1 \< 70% of the predicted

primary.measure: Number of the Patients That Achieve Higher Tolerance of Allergen With Immunotherapy
primary.description: Number of the patients that achieve higher tolerance of allergen with immunotherapy in one year than the measured baseline allergen challenge shows.

secondary.measure: Effect of Therapy on Lung Function.
secondary.description: Does hyposensitisation change lung function (do spirometry tests show difference from the baseline values (= before immunotherapy) after the immunotherapy) ?

secondary.measure: Does Oral Immunotherapy Change Bronchial Hyperreactivity?
secondary.description: Does bronchial hyperreactivity (measured with methacholine bronchial challenge test) show change from the baseline level after the immunotherapy?

secondary.measure: Does the Oral Immunotherapy Have en Effect on Airway Inflammation?
secondary.description: Does the oral immunotherapy change exhaled nitric oxide levels (measured before and after immunotherapy)

other.measure: Safety of Oral Immunotherapy in Severe IgE Mediated Food Allergy in Adults.
other.description: How many of the patients have side effects (categorized as mild, moderate or severe)of the hyposensitisation and how many of the patients discontinue the therapy because of side effects?

other.measure: Effect of Treatment on Quality of Life
other.description: Quality of life is assessed by a questionnaire before and after immunotherapy (VAS scale on worries on allergy 0-100, 0 no worries, 100 maximal worries).
